name: Jeff the Robot
description:
You'll need to collaborate with the AI robot Jeff to avoid getting impaled (too bad Jeff is not very smart). The first robot is not Jeff so, RUN!

In this game waves of robots try to impale you, but you can use Jeff the Robot to fight back, but he does nothing without your signal so, keep him close. The objective is to survive and kill as many enemies as possible.

WASD or Arrow keys to walk

Click near Jeff to attack.

ESC to close.

R to restart the game.

https://github.com/JoseWF/GameJam_Aug22 Code is public to check on Github.
